summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image displays a video game equipment menu, specifically focusing on headgear. The selected item is an "Uncommon" Folk Opera Mask, which provides a defense value of 7. It has the attribute "Every Bit Counts," which moderately increases the Will gained from defeating enemies. The mask can be equipped by pressing the designated button. The character's stats are shown on the right side, including health, stamina, attack power, defense, and other attributes. A quote at the bottom reads, "In tranquil lands, make a home. In the bustling market, make money."
